part_1.description: Detective Alex Monroe receives a mysterious letter hinting at a potential conspiracy involving a high-profile tech company, Innovotech. The letter suggests that Innovotech's new product, a virtual reality headset, has a hidden purpose. Alex decides to investigate, starting with a visit to Innovotech's headquarters.

part_2.description: Alex manages to secure an interview with Innovotech's PR Manager, Emily Carter. During the interview, Alex notices inconsistencies in Emily's story. Emily accidentally drops a keycard which Alex discreetly picks up. Alex decides to explore the restricted areas of the headquarters using the keycard.

part_3.description: In the restricted area, Alex finds a secret lab where Innovotech's VR headsets are being tested on unwilling subjects. Alex sees disturbing experiments and records evidence. He barely escapes when a security alarm is triggered, but not before grabbing a prototype headset.

part_6.description: Alex and Jamie go public with their findings, but Innovotech discredits them and labels them as conspiracy theorists. Undeterred, Alex decides to find the letter sender, believing they hold more crucial information. After following a series of cryptic clues, Alex tracks the sender to an abandoned warehouse.

part_7.description: In the warehouse, Alex meets the letter sender, revealed to be a former Innovotech employee named Sarah. Sarah provides detailed documents proving the company's sinister plans. Armed with this new evidence, Alex and Jamie expose Innovotech to the world, leading to a massive public outcry and government intervention.
